title: Resort Style Swimming Pool, Flexible Lease Terms Available
posting_body: ['Capri', '3295 Casey Drive , Las Vegas, NV, 89120', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 24', 'OR Text', '24', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Capri North and South Apartments in Las Vegas, NV', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 990 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Capri North and South Apartments are a beautiful, pet-friendly community that offers one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'These spacious residences feature fireplaces, oversized garden tubs, large walk-in closets, washers and dryers and covered parking.', 'Take advantage of our community amenities by relaxing in our resort-style swimming pool or getting in a good workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center.', 'Capri North and South are conveniently located near I-95 and Sunset Park and is minutes away from McCarran International Airport, UNLV, and other dining and shopping areas.', 'Features', '- Walk in Closets', '- Washer Dryer in Unit', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Digital Cable and Internet Included in Every Unit', 'Community Amenities', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- BBQ grills', '- Online Payments Accepted', '- Spa', '- WiFi Available', '- Professional Management', '- Gated Access', '- Resort Style Swimming Pool', '- Pet Stations', '- Business center', '- Fitness Center', '- 24-hour Maintenance', '- Dog Park', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'I95cSkDVE7Cm']
